description: Enlargement of front lightwell; installation of a staircase to front lightwell and additional railings to front garden; installation of 1x rooflight to side slope of the front section of the roofslope and 2x small conservation grade rooflights to the rear roof slope.
decision_conditions: REASON:  The enlargement of the front lightwell, loss of planting area, installation of a staircase to the front lightwell and a second line of railings to the front garden would result in an incongruous addition to the front of this dwelling house which would be harmful to the established character and appearance of the building and the wider streetscape.  This proposal is contrary to policy 9 of the Draft Core Strategy, policies D1 (Overall Design), D4 (Designing in Context), D11 (Alterations & Extensions) and D29 (Basements) of the Unitary Development Plan 2002 and Islingtonâ€™s Urban Design Guidance 2006.
